name: Lemon Bellini
description: This citrusy bellini variation is easy to make and refreshing to drink, lightly tart and just a little more sophisticated than the standard peach version.
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces sparkling wine or rosé Champagne
garnish: lemon wheel, sliced kumquats, or 3 raspberries, additional sorbet

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the sorbet with the vodka in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Add the champagne and stir gently. Strain into a champagne flute and garnish with lemon wheel, raspberries, or extra sorbet.
